Projects We Have Worked On

Featured Project

Virtual Try-On (VTO)

A web app for virtual product try-on, enhancing eCommerce experiences with real-time interactivity. Features include interactive virtual try-on, clean UI, and responsive design for desktop and mobile, built to bridge the gap between online shopping and in-store browsing.

ReactViteTailwind CSSHugging FaceCloudinary

Featured Project

Esabe Beauty eCommerce Website

A live eCommerce platform for a skincare and beauty brand, featuring service listings, booking functionality, and responsive design. Focused on creating a seamless, elegant shopping experience with user convenience in mind.

Next.jsTailwind CSS

Featured Project

Hospital Management System (HMS)

A real-time hospital management system built with React Native, actively used in a hospital environment. Features include patient and doctor management, appointment scheduling, and dynamic dashboards for efficient workflows.

React NativeNode.jsMongoDBExpress.jsAWS

Featured Project

Chatt App

A modern real-time messaging application with secure login and sleek animations. Features real-time messaging UI and user-friendly design, built to provide a fast and fluid communication experience.

ReactReact NativeFirebase

Featured Project

FoodFusion Recipe Generator

An AI-powered recipe generator web app with ingredient-based search, grocery list generation, and voice commands. Offers detailed recipe insights and meal categorization, blending technology with culinary creativity.

React.jsTailwind CSSSpoonacular APIOpenAI API

Projects

Explore our diverse array of transformative projects

Virtual Try-On (VTO)

A web app for virtual product try-on, enhancing eCommerce experiences with real-time interactivity. Features include interactive virtual try-on, clean UI, and responsive design for desktop and mobile, built to bridge the gap between online shopping and in-store browsing.

Esabe Beauty eCommerce Website

A live eCommerce platform for a skincare and beauty brand, featuring service listings, booking functionality, and responsive design. Focused on creating a seamless, elegant shopping experience with user convenience in mind.

Hospital Management System (HMS)

A real-time hospital management system built with React Native, actively used in a hospital environment. Features include patient and doctor management, appointment scheduling, and dynamic dashboards for efficient workflows.

Chatt App

A modern real-time messaging application with secure login and sleek animations. Features real-time messaging UI and user-friendly design, built to provide a fast and fluid communication experience.

FoodFusion Recipe Generator

An AI-powered recipe generator web app with ingredient-based search, grocery list generation, and voice commands. Offers detailed recipe insights and meal categorization, blending technology with culinary creativity.

FAQs

Answers to Your Common Questions

What services does Upward offer?

Upward offers comprehensive software solutions including development, design, and marketing services to meet all your digital needs.

Why choose Upward for software development?

Upward excels in software development with a team of skilled professionals dedicated to delivering innovative and high-quality solutions tailored to your requirements.

What's Upward' app development expertise?

Upward specializes in mobile app development, creating intuitive, feature-rich applications for seamless user experiences across platforms.

How does Upward develop websites?

Upward prioritizes user experience and scalability, ensuring your website effectively communicates your brand and achieves your goals.

How does Upward ensure design excellence?

Upward' design team combines creativity and expertise to craft visually stunning and user-friendly interfaces that elevate your brand and captivates your audience.

What's Upward' graphic design expertise?

Upward employs a collaborative process, combining creativity and strategic thinking to deliver graphic designs that align with your brand identity.

What marketing strategies does Upward employ?

Upward employs data-driven marketing strategies to enhance your online presence, drive traffic, & maximize your ROI through targeted campaigns and analytics-driven insights.

What e-commerce solutions does Upward offer?

Upward provides end-to-end e-commerce solutions, including platform development, customization, integration, to launch and scale your online store effectively.
